snippet: At one privately run hospital in central Athens, more than 1,000 of the staff have not been paid on time for three years.
lead_paragraph: At one privately run hospital in central Athens, more than 1,000 of the staff have not been paid on time for three years.

headline.main: When a Job Does Not Guarantee a Paycheck
headline.print_headline: When Even a Job Does Not Guarantee a Paycheck
